code: var encode=function encode(num){var DICTIONARY="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwuxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";var base=DICTIONARY.length;var encoded="";if(num===DICTIONARY[0]){return DICTIONARY[0];}while(num>0){encoded+=DICTIONARY[num%base];num=Math.floor(num/base);}return reverseWord(encoded);};var reverseWord=function reverseWord(str){var reverse="";for(var i=str.length-1;i>=0;i--){reverse+=str.charAt(i);}return reverse;};export default encode;
